name: CLARITY_HM_TOPIC
description: The CLARITY_HM_TOPIC table contains the names and IDs of your health maintenance topic records. These records include tests and procedures that form the basis for Health Maintenance plans in clinical system.

columns.name: HM_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the health maintenance topic record.

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.
